Uses of Package
xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates

Packages that use xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates
xxl.core.cursors.mappers The package xxl.core.cursors.mappers provides miscellaneous implementations of mapping operators on cursors. 
xxl.core.math.functions The package xxl.core.math.functions contains necessary classes and interfaces to work with real-valued functions. 
xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates provides several aggregate functions for nonparametric estimators. 
xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates The package xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates provides implementations of the techniques proposed in [HHW97]: J. 
 

Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates used by xxl.core.cursors.mappers
ReservoirSample
          This class provides sampling algorithms for the usage with the aggregator cursor.
ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy
          Interface providing a strategy for reservoir sampling techniques.
 

Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates used by xxl.core.math.functions
OnlineAggregation
          This class provides an interface for online aggregation functions.
 

Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates used by xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates
OnlineAggregation
          This class provides an interface for online aggregation functions.
 

Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates used by xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates
ConfidenceAggregationFunction
          In the context of online aggregation aggregates are iteratively computed.
ReservoirSample.AbstractStrategy
          This class provides a preimplementation of the ReservoirSamplingStrategy interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
ReservoirSample.ReservoirSamplingStrategy
          Interface providing a strategy for reservoir sampling techniques.
StatefulAverage
          Estimates iteratively the average of given numerical data without any error control.
StatefulVariance
          Computes the variance in a recursive manner using an algorithm based upon [Wes79]: D.H.D.
StatefulVarianceEstimator
          Computes an estimation of the variance (in this case the sample variance) in a recursive manner using an algorithm based upon [Wes79]: D.H.D.
StatelessVariance
          Provides the same functionality as StatefulVariance but keeps the state information.
StatelessVarianceEstimator
          Provides the same functionality as StatefulVarianceEstimator but keeps the state information.
